remarks: Nonzero elements form a multiplicative submonoid of any domain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Sep-2015.)
statement:
isdomn3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
isdomn3.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
isdomn3.u $e |- U = ( mulGrp ` R ) $.
isdomn3 $p |- ( R e. Domn <-> ( R e. Ring /\ ( B \ { .0. } ) e. ( SubMnd ` U ) ) ) $.
